collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (9 total Queries, 8 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.hover: This query was called more than once.

queries.sql: SELECT `job_posts`.*, `job_category`, `applicants` FROM `job_posts` LEFT JOIN `job_categories` ON `job_categories`.`id` = `job_posts`.`job_category_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(id) AS applicants, application_status, job_post_id FROM job_applications WHERE application_status <> 3 GROUP BY job_post_id) AS job_applications ON `job_applications`.`job_post_id` = `job_posts`.`id` WHERE `job_posts`.`is_deleted` = 0 AND `job_posts`.`status` = 1 AND `job_posts`.`job_date` >= '2023-06-26' ORDER BY `job_posts`.`posted_at` DESC LIMIT 10

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `job_posts`.*, `job_category`, `applicants` FROM `job_posts` LEFT JOIN `job_categories` ON `job_categories`.`id` = `job_posts`.`job_category_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(id) AS applicants, application_status, job_post_id FROM job_applications WHERE application_status <> 3 GROUP BY job_post_id) AS job_applications ON `job_applications`.`job_post_id` = `job_posts`.`id` WHERE `job_posts`.`is_deleted` = 0 AND `job_posts`.`status` = 1 AND `job_posts`.`job_date` >= '2023-06-26' ORDER BY `job_posts`.`posted_at` DESC LIMIT 10

    <figure class=\"image image-style-side\"><img src=\"http://localhost/peso/public/assets/media/ckeditor/1679619509.jpg\"></figure><p>The City Government of Baliwag is now looking for Government Internship Program (GIP) Interns! <br><br><strong>INTERVIEW SCHEDULE: MARCH 13, 2023 (Monday) • 9:00 AM</strong><br><br>All interested applicants may proceed to <i>Conference Room, 2/F Annex Bldg., City Government of Baliwag, Bagong Nayon, Baliwag, Bulacan.</i><br><br><strong>QUALIFICATIONS:</strong></p><ul><li>18-30 years old</li><li>College Graduate orTechnical-Vocational Graduate</li><li>Baliwag Resident</li><li>Computer Literate</li><li>Willing to do field work</li><li>No pending job application</li></ul><p><br><strong>DOCUMENTARY REQUIREMENTS:</strong></p><ul><li>Application Letter</li><li>Resumé</li><li>Photocopy of Birth Certificate</li><li>Photocopy of Diploma or TOR</li><li>Original and Photocopy of 1 Valid Government ID (Voter\'s ID or Voter\'s Certification)</li><li>1 Long Brown Envelope</li></ul><p><br>Only with complete documents will be considered. Limited slots only. Priority shall be given to FRESH GRADUATES.<br>For more details, please call or text 0966-623-9684.</p><blockquote><p>Pls LIKE <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/OfficialPESOBaliwag?__tn__=-]K*F\">https://www.facebook.com/OfficialPESOBaliwag/</a><br>Pls VISIT <a href=\"https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.baliwag.gov.ph%2Fpeso-jobs%2F%3Ffbclid%3DIwAR0QgqLIl6QdVGN-8eYMxuHa14Q2NZMHHqcFnDBGMKwwqekP2uzR8uQdKWg&h=AT0qAND9MMJqg01-jGOq19HoLRjoKlwx4Etjwudki2OWfas8vxci56dFXdFrpYQke9OeIXaifCC9aDcxK1JRGZ_uA5UWFz6urBW0khK8SgZi6wHAvU-DTIlrg13MgM3c3kB5&__tn__=-UK*F\">http://www.baliwag.gov.ph/peso-jobs/</a><br><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/pesobaliwag?__eep__=6&__tn__=*NK*F\">#PESOBaliwag</a><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/librengtrabaho?__eep__=6&__tn__=*NK*F\">#LibrengTrabaho</a><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/dugongbaliwagpusongbaliwag?__eep__=6&__tn__=*NK*F\">#DugongBaliwagPusongBaliwag</a><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/serbisyongmaymalasakit?__eep__=6&__tn__=*NK*F\">#SerbisyongMayMalasakit</a><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/wehealasone?__eep__=6&__tn__=*NK*F\">#WeHealAsOne</a> </p></blockquote><figure class=\"media\"><div data-oembed-url=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vFJcO_DDIs\"><div style=\"position: relative; padding-bottom: 100%; height: 0; padding-bottom: 56.2493%;\"><iframe src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/1vFJcO_DDIs\" style=\"position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; top: 0; left: 0;\" allow=\"autoplay; encrypted-media\" allowfullscreen=\"\" frameborder=\"0\"></iframe></div></div></figure>

    <figure class=\"image image-style-side\"><img src=\"http://localhost/peso/public/assets/media/ckeditor/1681367725.jpg\"></figure><h2><strong>Calling all Baliwagenyo students! </strong></h2><p><br>The City Government of Baliwag is now looking for <strong>SPECIAL PROGRAM FOR EMPLOYMENT OF STUDENTS (SPES)</strong> applicants.<br>Registration period: March 21-22, 2023 • 9:00 AM<br>All interested applicants may visit PESO <i>Baliwag at Baliwag Star Arena, Pagala, Baliwag, Bulacan</i>.<br><br><strong>QUALIFICATIONS:</strong></p><ul><li>Must be 15 - 30 years old</li><li>Must be a Resident of Baliwag</li><li>No Failing Grades</li><li>Currently Enrolled</li><li>Parents\' combined annual income after tax shall not exceed Php 189, 504.00</li></ul><p> </p><p><strong>REQUIREMENTS:</strong></p><ul><li>Updated Resume</li><li>PSA Birth Certificate</li><li>Certified True Copy of ANY of the following to at least student\'s true rating:<ul><li>Form 138 (High School Students) (as of the 3rd Grading period for SY. 2022-2023)</li><li>Class Cards, Report of Grades or Certificate of Grades (College Students) (1st or 2nd Semesters of SY. 2022-2023)</li></ul></li><li>School ID</li><li>Certified Copy of Latest Income Return (ITR) duly filed with the Bureau of Internal Revenue (BIR) for wage earner parents or Brgy. Indigency for non-wage earner parents.</li><li>1 Long Brown Envelope</li></ul><p>LIMITED SLOTS ONLY.<br><br>Pls LIKE: <a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/OfficialPESOBaliwag?__cft__[0]=AZX0vP0dvLCYZuMrMBzIZCsbOR1cIe8W70sq7ifg-CbxtP49H61YB162wC1lMGWdvqQS9QORT5RRVvtsL3F8XILpjlUDEDEjD7tCapeq_kphu-KvmbhNXAYEYBigqtYLoSbL2-nsbVvkwL-H-zLhZIYko8BimbgAgJtAlW2l2lmRpw&__tn__=-]K*F\">https://www.facebook.com/OfficialPESOBaliwag/</a><br>Pls VISIT <a href=\"http://www.baliwag.gov.ph/peso-jobs/?fbclid=IwAR2mLoJTtxzC9sh-EYlk4h_OTxTKkriO4gQO9K5EcJRjsCmtTnm7SxJ6mcQ\">http://www.baliwag.gov.ph/peso-jobs/</a><br>Pls DOWNLOAD Baliwag High FVE Mobile App<br><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/pesobaliwag?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZX0vP0dvLCYZuMrMBzIZCsbOR1cIe8W70sq7ifg-CbxtP49H61YB162wC1lMGWdvqQS9QORT5RRVvtsL3F8XILpjlUDEDEjD7tCapeq_kphu-KvmbhNXAYEYBigqtYLoSbL2-nsbVvkwL-H-zLhZIYko8BimbgAgJtAlW2l2lmRpw&__tn__=*NK*F\">#PESOBaliwag</a> <br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/librengtrabaho?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZX0vP0dvLCYZuMrMBzIZCsbOR1cIe8W70sq7ifg-CbxtP49H61YB162wC1lMGWdvqQS9QORT5RRVvtsL3F8XILpjlUDEDEjD7tCapeq_kphu-KvmbhNXAYEYBigqtYLoSbL2-nsbVvkwL-H-zLhZIYko8BimbgAgJtAlW2l2lmRpw&__tn__=*NK*F\">#LibrengTrabaho</a><br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/dugongbaliwagpusongbaliwag?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZX0vP0dvLCYZuMrMBzIZCsbOR1cIe8W70sq7ifg-CbxtP49H61YB162wC1lMGWdvqQS9QORT5RRVvtsL3F8XILpjlUDEDEjD7tCapeq_kphu-KvmbhNXAYEYBigqtYLoSbL2-nsbVvkwL-H-zLhZIYko8BimbgAgJtAlW2l2lmRpw&__tn__=*NK*F\">#DugongBaliwagPusongBaliwag</a> <br><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/serbisyongmaymalasakit?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZX0vP0dvLCYZuMrMBzIZCsbOR1cIe8W70sq7ifg-CbxtP49H61YB162wC1lMGWdvqQS9QORT5RRVvtsL3F8XILpjlUDEDEjD7tCapeq_kphu-KvmbhNXAYEYBigqtYLoSbL2-nsbVvkwL-H-zLhZIYko8BimbgAgJtAlW2l2lmRpw&__tn__=*NK*F\">#SerbisyongMayMalasakit</a></p>

    <p>Malugod na pagbati sa Bayan ng Baliwag sa pagkakahirang bilang NATIONAL WINNER, 2021 Secretary\'s Bayanihan Service Awards (1st - 2nd Class Municipality Category) at Special Citation - Choice of the Press Award. Iginawad ngayong ika-25 ng Oktubre kasabay ang pagdiriwang ng 22nd National PESO Congress, Clark, Pampanga.</p><p>Ito ang bunga ng ating Todo-Todong Serbisyong may Malasakit!</p><p><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/yestobaliwagcity?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZViDG2RRmWxLfQr0oUT5Zj_z4f8zzSQYuEkO2bXzMrIu6yV8Vf33h7NkcKMAdr6nYTAoQcNv2aF7W86pPO94pehmUatMR7O1x5MD75CvpbtGvq3okriP9UskCtLWGxlDV28NMzQXY1QaemNK9ZnRWJ_&__tn__=*NK-R\">#YesToBaliwagCity</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/pesobaliwag?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZViDG2RRmWxLfQr0oUT5Zj_z4f8zzSQYuEkO2bXzMrIu6yV8Vf33h7NkcKMAdr6nYTAoQcNv2aF7W86pPO94pehmUatMR7O1x5MD75CvpbtGvq3okriP9UskCtLWGxlDV28NMzQXY1QaemNK9ZnRWJ_&__tn__=*NK-R\">#PESOBaliwag</a></p><p><a href=\"https://www.facebook.com/hashtag/todotodongserbisyongmaymalasakit?__eep__=6&__cft__[0]=AZViDG2RRmWxLfQr0oUT5Zj_z4f8zzSQYuEkO2bXzMrIu6yV8Vf33h7NkcKMAdr6nYTAoQcNv2aF7W86pPO94pehmUatMR7O1x5MD75CvpbtGvq3okriP9UskCtLWGxlDV28NMzQXY1QaemNK9ZnRWJ_&__tn__=*NK-R\">#TodoTodongSerbisyongMayMalasakit</a></p><figure class=\"image\"><img src=\"http://localhost/peso/public/assets/media/ckeditor/1681284486.jpg\"></figure>
